description: Fully outsourced contract for the following 3 services: audio conferencing, web conferencing, and operator assisted services with the following 2 Streams (Stream 2 will be an optional future solution): Stream 1: Services are provided by the Vendor's own conferencing platform(s) (Option for future) Stream 2: Services are provided by the Vendor's resources leveraging the Government of Canada's conferencing platforms.
duration_in_months: But subject to the closing date January 2, 2023.
full_summary:
# Conferencing & Operator Assisted Services (COAS) Request for Proposal

## Request Details

* Reference Number: PW-22-01014271
* Solicitation Number: 105809
* Publication Date: November 22, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: January 2, 2023, 13:00:00 local time
* Amendment Date: December 1, 2022
* Expected Contract Start Date: Not Specified
* Expected Contract End Date: Not Specified
* Tender Status: Expired

## Goods and Services

* Telecommunications - Voice Service (G861B; G399B)
* Telecommunications - Teleconferencing (D399B; D399BS)

## Procurement Details

* Procurement Category: Service (SRV)
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Based on a comprehensive evaluation of tendered solutions
* Limited Tendering Reason: Not specified

## Trade Agreements

* The tender is subject to the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, and Canadian Free Trade Agreement

## Contracting Information

* Contracting Entity: Shared Services Canada
* Contracting Entity Address: 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario K0A 0C3, Canada

## Contact Information

* Name: Eric Vanasse
* Email: [eric.vanasse@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:eric.vanasse@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
* Phone: (514) 607-8519

## Documents and Attachments

* COAS Summary - Buy and Sell - English - November 21, 2022 (amended)
* COAS Summary - Buy and Sell - French - November 21, 2022 (amended)
* Conferencing Operator Assisted Services (COAS) Request for Information Amendment 001 (English and French) (expires December 31, 2022)

## Important Notes

* A security assessment is required for cloud-based services.
* The top-ranked bidder will be required to have their Cloud Service Provider's services assessed under the ITSM.50.062 Cloud Security Risk Management prior to contract award.
